title: Standard Chartered Taps B2C2 to Build "Connectivity Layer" for Institutional Crypto Trading
tags: B2C2 Launches PENNY for Instant, Zero-fee Stablecoin SwapsSBI Holdings-owned B2C2, a global leader in institutional liquidity for digital assets, has launched PENNY, the industry’s first zero-fee stablecoin swap solution.
